item.title: Bio
item.description:
Ira Miller is the Founder and Ambassador of the GitGuild. Advisor to Tigo CTM, Dash, Bitt and more fantastic projects.

Ira has founded many technology startups, lately focused on the blockchain sector. In 2012, Ira co-founded global payment processor Coinapult, selling the company in 2015 to pursue open source collaborative projects through the GitGuild.

In 2015, Ira and Sebastian Mendoza co-directed Founder Institute Panama City, a chapter of a global entrepreneurship incubator. Next he hopes to take the valuable lessons and connections from FI to create a free and open source technology incubator in Panama.
